title: Character Creation
content:
n) Chins: Choose from different Chin designs (specific to Dragonborn) Jaws: Choose from different Jaw designs (specific to Dragonborn)

Further Customization:

The following customization options are edited with a slider to determine how intense or how much of the following features players would like to see on their character.

Maturity Freckle Quantity Freck Intensity Vitiligo Pigmentation

Other Customization Options

Aside from the general customization options players can also choose to fur
